div.p: FACTS ROCK SOLID. FINALLY, TONIGHT, THE FACTOR TIP
OF THE DAY. THERE IS A WEBSITE CALLED
OVERSTOCK.COM THAT SAYS IT WILL SAVE YOU MONEY ON JUST ABOUT
ANYTHING. SO WE ASKED OUR INTERNET
DETECTIVES TO CHECK IT OUT. HERE IS THEIR ASSESSMENT.
OVERSTOCK.COM WILL INDEED SAVE YOU MONEY.
ITS CLAIMS ARE MOSTLY TRUE. ALSO GOOGLE.COM/SHOPPING.
CAN DIRECT YOU TO GREAT DEALS ALL OVER THE PLACE.
OFTEN ON OVERSTOCK.COM. SO THOSE TWO WEBSITES, YOU WANT
TO SAVE MONEY FOR JUST ABOUT ANYTHING, THAT IS WHERE YOU GO.
FACTOR TIP OF THE DAY, CHECK THEM OUT.
AND THAT IS IT FOR US TODAY. PLEASE CHECK OUT THE FOX NEWS
FACTOR WEBSITE WHICH IS DIFFERENT FROM BILLOREILLY.COM.
